1: Great location to Michigan avenue and easy access to Lake Shore Drive
The Hotel is located close to the Mag Mile Restaurants Lake Shore Drive Navy Pier and so many other main attractions
The room was nicely decorated and comfortable with a view of Lake Michigan which was nice
We checked in and our room was very nice on a high floor with a great view of the lake and the pool
In addition we were upgraded to a corner room upon arrival which gave us a walk in closet bathroom with a shower and full tub and a great view of the lake and city
The restaurant Burrito Beach was definitely worth the walk around the corner
3 blocks from the lake makes for good exercise location
